Module count
Package count.model

Class Likelihood.Profile

java.lang.Object
count.model.Likelihood.Profile
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ancestor.Profile
Enclosing class:
Likelihood
class Likelihood.Profile
extends Object
Class for storing profile-specific conditional likelihoods.
Author:
csuros

    • computeLikelihoods

      public void computeLikelihoods()
      Computes the conservation log-likelihoods. Automatically called by getEdgeLikelihoods(int) and getNodeLikelihoods(int) if they are not yet initalized. Call if parameters change.

    • getLogLikelihood

    • computeEdge

      private void computeEdge​(int node)
      Allocates and computes a row for edge_likelihoods using node_likelihoods.
      Parameters:
      node - must be called in postorder

    • computeNode

      private void computeNode​(int node)
      Algorithm for computing the node likelihood, and filling the values in node_likelihoods at one row. The actual calculations fare done by computeSibling(int, double[], double), adding one child at a time to an increasing set of siblings.
      Parameters:
      node - called in postorder, after computeEdge(int)

    • computeSibling

      double[] computeSibling​(int junior, double[] C, double eps)
      Algorithm for adding one child to a set of siblings. Called from computeNode(int). (Summing by surviving copies in this lineage.)
      Parameters:
      junior - new child to be added
      C - siblings' (survival) log-likelihoods (will be destroyed)
      eps - siblings' extinction
      Returns:
      survival log-likelihoods for junior+siblings

    • computeSiblingClassic

      private double[] computeSiblingClassic​(int sister, double[] C, double eps)
      Deprecated.
      Algorithm in old Count (summing by surviving copies in previous siblings).
      Parameters:
      sister -
      C -
      eps -
      Returns:
